features: DC Comics, The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set The Flash and Batman Action Figures, 4-inch Playset Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 3 and Up
body.description: Take The Flash adventures to new height with The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set – featuring 4-inch The Flash, Michael Keaton Batman, Batwing Vehicle! The Flash movie action figures are highly detailed with 11 points of articulation for dynamic battle stances. Open up the cockpit and place The Flash and Batman into the epic Batwing vehicle. Pull up the landing gear and get defend the world against chaos! With a detailed sculpt and awesome movie-styling, your figures will come to life! Kids love to engage their imagination and create their own Super Hero vs Super Villain scenes! The fate of the world is in your hands. With a range of cool toys for boys and girls to collect from The Flash movie, you can now expand your DC action figures with The Flash, Dark Flash, Batman action figure, and more (each sold separately). These toys for girls and boys gifts are perfect for kids that love Justice League collectible figurines, DC multiverse, Super Hero movies collectibles, RC cars, and more! Bring home your favorite Flash characters and Batwing with The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set Take The Flash adventures to new height with The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set – featuring 4-inch The Flash, Michael Keaton Batman, Batwing Vehicle! The Flash movie action figures are highly detailed with 11 points of articulation for dynamic battle stances. Open up the cockpit and place The Flash and Batman into the epic Batwing vehicle. Pull up the landing gear and get defend the world against chaos! With a detailed sculpt and awesome movie-styling, your figures will come to life! Kids love to engage their imagination and create their own Super Hero vs Super Villain scenes! The fate of the world is in your hands. Includes Batwing Vehicle The Flash Figure Michael Keaton Batman Figure

ULTIMATE BATWING SET The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set includes Batwing and 2 iconic action figures – The Flash and Michael Keaton Batman! Team up the iconic heroes and launch into action! STORYTELLING AND CREATIVITY Kids love to recreate their favorite scenes from The Flash movie and use their imagination to create their own storylines with their favorite Super Heroes and Super-Villains. EASY TO POSE Each 4-inch The Flash and Michael Keaton Batman figure features 11 points of articulation, making it easy to pose the action figure into a variety of dynamic poses!

The Flash Ultimate Figure Set Speed Force The Flash Action Figure The Flash Ultimate Batwing Set The Flash Batwing Battle Set 1989 Batmobile RC The Flash Hero Set, Iconic Mask with Visor and Ring AGE 3+ 4+ 3+ 3+ 14+ 4+ ABOUT Collect all 5 action figures from The Flash in this Amazon Exclusive, including The Flash, Batman, The Flash Young Barry, General Zod and Supergirl! The 12-inch Speed Force The Flash action figure comes with full armor and lightning speed action features! Press Flash’s chest logo or shake to activate unique light patterns across his suit and sounds. Open up the cockpit and place The Flash and Batman into the epic Batwing vehicle. Pull up the landing gear and get defend the world against chaos! The Flash Batwing Battle Set is a must-have for DC fans – featuring The Flash, Supergirl, and an exclusive Nam-Ek. Team up the iconic heroes and take down enemies! The limited edition 1989 Batmobile RC comes to life with dynamic light-up headlights, water-activated smoke effects - perfect experience to replicate iconic scenes from the movie Suit up as the fastest kid on earth with The Flash Hero Set, including an iconic light-up The Flash mask and ring! INCLUDES 5 Figures with Accessories 1 Speed Force The Flash Figure 2 Figures, Batwing 3 Figures, Batwing 1 Batmobile RC, 1 Charging Base, 1 4-inch Batman Figure, 1 Water Dropper, 2 AAA Batteries The Flash Mask, The Flash Ring

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Batwing and figures!
reviews.reviewText: I have to tell you that I am a huge fan of Batman, and own a massive collection of Batman related ephemera. I have an entire wall of Batwing toys, including the new Gold Label McFarlane one. Spin Masters’ design is excellent here, and the new figures are a cool bonus. And, inexpensive, too! This new Batwing toy is one great example of how to make a great toy without breaking your wallet. And the figures will fit in the cockpit, one at a time. It has retractable landing gear, too. Quite a lot of play value here, and for us collectors, it’s a great display piece. Easily five stars! Thanks for reading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value. The Batwing is nice quality and size.
reviews.reviewText: The figures and Batwing have nice details and the Batwing is fairly big for $25. I would highly recommend for any Batman fans especially of the Michael Keaton Batman.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There's not much to this. It it made very simple, with not much detail. The little Flash and Batman are very nice. There's more detail on them then the vehicle. But the vehicle doesn't need much detail. It's great the way they did it. I'm just glad they put landing gear on it, so it can display better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, inexpensive version of the ""alternate" 1989 batwing from The Flash movie
reviews.reviewText: Simple product but nice. Not a lot of detail to be had on the batwing to begin with but I bought this because even though it comes with two 4-in figures, the overall size of this alternate batwing is bigger (and shaped differently) than the original 1989 batwing and scales pretty well with the Batman figures that come with the Jada 1/24 batmobiles, which are just under 3 in. The cockpit is oversized to house one 4-in figure but from the movie we see it can hold three people, one in the front and two in the back, and those 2.75-in figures seem to be about right for this model. Obviously you can't seat those in the Batwing but standing next to it, it seems to be the right scale. So that's basically why I got it and I'm happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big and awesome!
reviews.reviewText: Looks very cool and much bigger than expected in a good way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toy is excellent well made for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Yes, they have this at Walmart, but it's $15-$20 less on Amazon. I almost wanted to play with it myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I've always been partial to 3.75 inch figures so I really liked this batwing. It's kind of basic but it comes with 2 good looking figures and a great looking batwing. It's fairly sturdy except for maybe the canopy. So young kids should get good use and enjoyment out of it.

La caja venía algo tocada, para un coleccionista no sirve, debería de haber venido más protegida para el viaje tan largo que ha tenido. El artículo está bien pero la caja no tenía protección tipo papel o corcho, hay mil formas de proteger el artículo, no era tan grande.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple and Basic but Allows for Creativity
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for display and not for play. It is a very basic model without much details and completely lack of any paint, it's just all plain black plastic. That's why the 4 stars. But I guess therein lies the potential beauty of this model, as it allows me the freedom to add the details that I want, with touch up colors, weathering and adding LED lighting effects. Even though there's a larger version from Spin Master, I actually prefer this smaller version where Batman actually sits properly inside the cockpit. I can't wait to transform this!
